inputs.remark: Visit alignment: Aided soundâ€‘field thresholds should be in V3 (not V2). Speech perception (HINT/CNC) should be in V4.

logic_summary: Moved 'Aided Soundfield Thresholds' from V2 to V3 as the text indicates these were measured upon the patient's return for the third visit.
Created V4 for 'Speech-in-noise / Speech Perception' as the text states these were measured at the next visit following a 1-month adjustment period.
Updated collective interpretations for V2 and V3 to reflect the redistribution of tests and chronological flow.

patch_ops.value: Hearing aid verification and trial were conducted. Loaner aids were verified to meet DSL targets; patient reported settings comfortable.

value.name: Real Ear Measures (REM)
value.result_summary: Loaner aids adjusted to meet adult DSL targets; patient reported settings comfortable.

patch_ops.value: Upon return, the patient reported no noticeable functional improvement. Aided sound-field thresholds were measured but the goal of 25 dB HL was not met. ABR testing ruled out ANSD.

value.name: Aided Soundfield Thresholds
value.result_summary: 30-45 dB HL range achieved; goal of 25 dB HL not met.

value.name: Auditory Brainstem Response (ABR)
value.result_summary: Wave I, III, V complex present; ruled out ANSD.

value.collective_interpretation: Following a 1-month trial, speech perception scores fell within CI candidacy criteria despite the 'off-label' residual hearing.

tests.name: Speech-in-noise / Speech Perception
tests.result_summary: HINT (Quiet) 59% binaural, 30% left; CNC 32% binaural. Scores met CI candidacy criteria.
